package.name: First_Data_Gateway_Integration
package.summary: This extension allows you to make payments using FirstData Global Gateway for all your online shopping needs.
package.description: To facilitate the payment options, this extension provides seamless integration with First Data Global Gateway. This extension allows you to make secure payments using FirstData Global Gateway for all your online shopping needs. It supports all credit cards such as Visa, MasterCard, AE, JCB etc.
package.notes: This version is properly tested on the following Magento CE versions: 1.5, 1.6, 1.7,1.8,1.9.* . In this particular version we are supporting it to run on PHP V 7.0.99
